tool_description: Creates buffer zones around geographic features for spatial analysis, such as analyzing land use within specified distances of transit, schools, or other amenities.

feature_coordinates.description: Coordinates of features to buffer [lat1, lon1, lat2, lon2, ...]

feature_type.description: Type of feature being buffered: point, line, polygon

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Coordinates must be valid latitude/longitude pairs in decimal degrees.
Invalid buffer distance: Buffer distance must be positive and less than 10 miles (52800 feet).
Invalid feature type: Use one of [point, line, polygon].
Coordinate count mismatch: Point features need 2 coordinates, lines need at least 4, polygons need at least 6.
usage: Specify feature_coordinates as coordinate pairs, buffer_distance in feet, and feature_type. The tool generates buffer zones for spatial analysis operations.

buffer_area_acres.description: Total area of all buffer zones in acres

overlapping_buffers.description: Whether any buffer zones overlap each other
